When a local pimp is publicly humiliated by a snobbish college girl, he manipulates her into a life of sexual slavery at his brothel, where he gradually falls in love with her.
 Kim Ki-Duk, the award-winning director of THE ISLE and SPRING, SUMMER, FALL, WINTER... and SPRING, has created a lurid fable of obsessive love, using a potent mix of dark romance, surrealist technique, and violent action.
